Description: This is one of the FUNNEST apartments I've been in lol, gorgeous view from floor to ceiling windows, GIGANTIC 3 bedroom / 3 bathroom penthouse DUPLEX near corner of Arlington and Beacon Streets. This PENTHOUSE UNIT features a modern kitchen w/dishwasher and garbage disposal, wood floors and a decorative fireplace in the living room. Hot water is included in the rent - tenants are responsible for all other utilities. No pets.
